articles.description: An India legend, also a World Cup winning all-rounder, was brutal in his assessment of Riyan Parag. In fact, he feels Parag is one of the few players who hasn't shown any improvement as the IPL has moved from one season to another.
articles.content: Ever since Riyan Parag said that he wants to be the greatest finisher in Indian cricket, he has only managed to rub people off the wrong way. The Rajasthan Royals batter has been in the news more for… [+2198 chars]

articles.title: All-round Livingstone stars in Lancashire's big win; Sam Curran helps Surrey defend 129 | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Meanwhile, in a rain-hit, eight-overs-a-side match at Headingley, Wayne Madsen and Shan Masood combined to gun down Yorkshire's total of 83 with three balls to spare
articles.content:
